QuestData.Title: A Little on the Side
QuestData.Description: You know, it's our moral obligation to save all of this Elementium from the shale spiders. Those creepy things eat the stuff!$B$BWhat a waste!$B$BSo, what do you say? 90/10 my way?
QuestData.CompletionText: How much do you think you can carry?
QuestData.RewardText: <Goldmine slyly looks at the pile of Elementium shards.>$B$BHmm, I don't think that stuff's going to sell for much. I better give you your cut right now so you don't feel ripped off.
